title: Transfer Funds in a Variable Annuity
description: A variable annuity holder wants to move money from a bond subaccount to an equity subaccount.

tasks.description: Identify the contract holder and their investment subaccounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their current fund allocation.

tasks.description: Take the client's instructions for the fund transfer (amount, from/to subaccounts).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the transfer request.
Agent successfully executes the transfer between the internal funds.
